details: co-designed the course curriculum and assignments
built and maintained the course website
designed and led two lectures and hands-on sessions, topics including mechanical assembly and color-changing materials
graded and provided feedback to student visualization assignments and final projects
held office hours (2hr/week) to answer assignment and project questions
assigned participation grades for students' recitation participation
graded system critiques (part of the homework)
held office hours (2hr/week) to answer homework, quiz and project questions
transitioned from regular on-campus teaching to COVID-time online teaching (set up the recitation slack, piazza and scheduled the online mini-recitations)
taught weekly recitations for two sections
helped draft, test and grade quizzes
created part of the problem sets, recitation notes and mini-quizzes
held office hours (4hr/week) to answer problem set and quiz questions
